title: Sri Lanka : President and Prime Minister condemn violence.
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan President Gotabaya Rajapaksa and Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa have condemned the violence that is taking place in Colombo. The President and Prime Minister tweeted their condemations.
Human Rights Commission condemns violence on peaceful protests, and police inaction
BREAKING: Police Curfew imposed for Colombo South, North, and Central
